content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. May I have your name so I can help get things started for your HVAC issue?
Thanks, Jenna! Could you please provide your address so I can make sure we service your area?
Thank you! And just to confirm – which HVAC issue are you having? For example, is it heating or cooling-related, or something else?
Uh, my AC stopped blowing cold air. It’s just like, regular air now, you know?
Got it, thanks for letting me know. When would be a good time for us to send a technician to take a look at your AC?
Actually, I can’t really schedule yet. My insurance might cover it but I have to wait to hear back first. Can I get back to you later?
reason: Customer waiting for insurance approval before scheduling.

content: No problem, Jenna! Just let us know whenever you’re ready to book. We’ll be here to help once your insurance gives you the go-ahead. Have a great day!
reason: Customer waiting for insurance approval before scheduling.
